name: PKToolPicker
desc: A tool palette that displays a selection of drawing tools and colors for tools and colors that a user can choose from.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new instance of a tool picker.

items.name: func addObserver(PKToolPickerObserver)
items.desc: Adds the specified object to the list of objects to notify when the picker configuration changes.

items.name: func removeObserver(PKToolPickerObserver)
items.desc: Removes the specified object from the list of objects to notify when the picker configuration changes.

items.name: protocol PKToolPickerObserver
items.desc: An interface you use to detect when the user changes the selected tools and drawing characteristics of a tool picker object.

items.name: func setVisible(Bool, forFirstResponder: UIResponder)
items.desc: Sets the visibility for the tool picker, based on when the specified responder object becomes active.

items.name: var isVisible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the tool picker is currently visible.

items.name: func frameObscured(in: UIView) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the portion of the specified view that the tool picker obscures.

items.name: var selectedTool: PKTool
items.desc: The currently selected tool in this tool picker.

items.name: var colorUserInterfaceStyle: UIUserInterfaceStyle
items.desc: The user interface style for this tool picker.

items.name: var isRulerActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the ruler is visible on the canvas.

items.name: var overrideUserInterfaceStyle: UIUserInterfaceStyle
items.desc: The specific user interface style to apply to this tool picker.

items.name: var showsDrawingPolicyControls: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the default drawing policy UI is visible.

items.name: var stateAutosaveName: String?
